body:
Comment 3 by **extrudedaluminiu**: 
I don't use a proxy, strace reveals a successful connection from the login, but
change never tries to contact the rietveld serves, only localhost.

Here are the only connect()s by 'hg change':
connect(3, {sa_family=AF_FILE, path="/var/run/nscd/socket"}, 110) = -1 ENOENT (No
such file or directory)
connect(3, {sa_family=AF_FILE, path="/var/run/nscd/socket"}, 110) = -1 ENOENT (No
such file or directory)
connect(3, {sa_family=AF_INET, sin_port=htons(1), sin_addr=inet_addr("127.0.0.1")},
16) = 0
connect(3, {sa_family=AF_INET6, sin6_port=htons(1), inet_pton(AF_INET6, "::1",
&sin6_addr), sin6_flowinfo=0, sin6_scope_id=0}, 28) = 0
connect(3, {sa_family=AF_INET6, sin6_port=htons(1), inet_pton(AF_INET6, "::1",
&sin6_addr), sin6_flowinfo=0, sin6_scope_id=0}, 28) = -1 ECONNREFUSED (Connection
refused)
connect(3, {sa_family=AF_INET, sin_port=htons(1), sin_addr=inet_addr("127.0.0.1")},
16) = -1 ECONNREFUSED (Connection refused)
